product_name: florence by millsFloating Under The Eyes Depuffing Gel Pads
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganFlorence by mills cute lil' Floating Under The Eyes Depuffing Gel Pads float under eyes to help wake up fatigued, puffy skin that sometimes can create the appearance of dark circles. They are soaked in a soothing essence that hydrates and depuffs with caffeine, green tea, and cactus extracts.
details: DetailsBenefitsHelps de-puff under eye area with caffeineÂ Hydrates & soothes with cactus and green tea extractsÂ Includes 30 pairs of cute, cloud-shaped patchesÂ Key IngredientsCaffeine extract helps de-puff under eye areaGreen tea extract helps soothe skinCactus extract provides water-binding & hydrating propertiesFormulated WithoutParabensSulfatesSiliconesItem 2594309How To UsePlace a pair of clouds under the eyes. Leave on for 10-15 minutes.IngredientsWater/Aqua/Eau, Glycerin, Carrageenan, Butylene Glycol, Caffeine, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Ceratonia Siliqua (Carob) Gum, Cyamopsis Tetragonoloba (Guar) Gum, Pentylene Glycol, Ethyl Hexanediol, Hexylene Glycol, Pinus Sylvestris Leaf Extract, Allantoin, Calcium Chloride, Cellulose Gum, Chlorphenesin, Chondrus Crispus Powder, PEG-60 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Potassium Chloride, Sucrose, 1,2-Hexanediol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Calcium Lactate, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Opuntia Ficus-Indica Stem Extract, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Hydroxyacetophenone, Illicium Verum (Anise) Fruit Extract, Sodium Phytate, Norbornanediamine/Resorcinol Diglycidyl Ether Crosspolymer, Arginine, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Propanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Polymethylsilsesquioxane, Silica, Polyglyceryl-10 Oleate, Aluminum Hydroxide, Fucus Vesiculosus Extract, Prunella Vulgaris Extract, Anemarrhena Asphodeloides Root Extract, Citric Acid, Tocopherol, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), CI 77492, CI 42090.
how_to_use: Place a pair of clouds under the eyes. Leave on for 10-15 minutes.

reviews.headline: Refused to stay in place
reviews.comments: I'm very happy I got these as a sample and didn't pay for them. They wouldn't stay in place no matter how many times I put them back. From the moment I placed them under my eyes they started to slide down. Every ten to twenty seconds I had to slide them back up. Blinking made them slide down even faster. After a few minutes of this I finally gave up and just held them in place. In my opinion these are definitely not worth the frustration.

reviews.headline: Slippery dippery
reviews.comments: Slides down. Wont stay put at all. Cant enjoy the "relaxing me time" with these bc i spend more time fixing them back in place.

reviews.headline: I really enjoy these
reviews.comments: I'm about halfway through the container and I really enjoy using this product. Does it work miracles? Probably not. It does give me a quick refresh and I just feel better after using. The little spoon is great to help get the patches out. I little pricey, but I purchased at a discount. I'll probably purchase again.

reviews.headline: avoid
reviews.comments: After 15, youll take it off and its like some of it melted and small pieces stay on face

reviews.headline: Knocking on 40s door
reviews.comments: I'll be 39 tomorrow! These are my favorite under eye patches. I do keep them in the fridge for the extra cooling factor and they work amazing! I've tried a ton of them and was very surprised by how well these work!!

reviews.headline: Clearly for no one over 30
reviews.comments:
I'm in my 30's and found major issues with these. 

#1 My vision is fine. I have 20/20, yet I had to magnify the label and turn my phone light on to read it  lol. 

#2 you can't move at all, or they slide down your face. I often put on eye pads while I get ready or do chores, as do allllllll my friends. They slide right off the face as you move. 

#3 I saw no changes to the area at all. PASS!

reviews.headline: Clearly for no one over 30

I'm in my 30's and found major issues with these. 

#1 My vision is fine. I have 20/20, yet I had to magnify the label and turn my phone light on to read it  lol.

reviews.headline: bright eyes!
reviews.comments: I was looking for eye masks with caffeine to reduce puffiness in the AM. These are it! These do the job well!

reviews.headline: Nice feel.
reviews.comments: They are nice and cold when you put them on even without a fridge to chill. They smell nice and dont really burn as long as you make sure you clean your face beforehand. I think they work nicely too.

reviews.headline: Great eye pads
reviews.comments:
I had these in a bag that I got free for purchasing so much merchandise. 
First off, these are the first eye pads that actually fit the contour of the eyes. very well designed. 
They feel great. There is plenty of excess serum to massage into your face and neck plus under eyes after removal. 
My eyes looked hydrated and less wrinkled. 
I give them high marks all around! :)

reviews.headline: Great product
reviews.comments: I'm on my second jar of them. They do wake up tired looking eyes not to mention they feel wonderful . I recommended them to a girlfriend she loves them as well.

reviews.headline: I Love it!
reviews.comments: It's very calming and they feel so nice. The only thing is that they make holes really easily. Other than that, I love them. I love Millie Bobby Brown also! Go Stranger Things! So good. You don't even have to wear them for long. Made by JuJu!

reviews.headline: Absolutely love these !!
reviews.comments: Love these so much will be buying more actually can tell a difference 10/10 recommend

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments: I love most things from the Florence by Mills line, and this product isn't an exception. I love the applicator that comes with it and my eye bags have brightened and improved after a few uses.

reviews.headline: Florence by Mills Depuffing Pads
reviews.comments: Indifferent. Kept slipping down. Didn't notice a difference in my under eye area but felt nice while on.

reviews.headline: They work fantastic !!!
reviews.comments:
I've been using the Florence by Mills Floating Under The Eye Gel Pads, and they've quickly become a go to in my skincare routine. These eye gels are a lifesaver, especially on those mornings when I need a quick pick-me-up. The cooling sensation is incredibly refreshing, and they instantly make my under-eye area feel more awake and hydrated.

What I love most is how they visibly reduce puffiness and soften the appearance of dark circles after just one use. The hydrogel material adheres perfectly to my skin without slipping, so I can pop them on while I'm getting ready or just relaxing. Plus, they're infused with a blend of nourishing ingredients that leave my under-eyes feeling smooth and plump.

reviews.headline: amazingg
reviews.comments: I got this product sent because I am part of the Flosquad and let me tell you that I am obsessed! It is a must have specially if you have dry/ dark or puffiness under your eyes 10/10

reviews.headline: Perfect for makeup preparation
reviews.comments:
I love this product, i love how hydrating it left my undereyes. It also depuffed my eyebags alot and feel super refreshing! 
I totally recommend these for prepping your undereyes for makeup, concealer, foundation.

reviews.headline: Get these!
reviews.comments: Florence by mills doesnt disappoint! I love these floating under eye gel padsâ€¦ they are hydratingâ€¦ deep, puffing, and have amazing ingredients!

reviews.headline: So refreshing and hydrating
reviews.comments: I received a free sample in exchange for my honest review. I love how refreshing/hydrating the gel pads feel to my skin and has a very calming, cooling effect when you put them on. Very relaxing and a skincare treat for sure! #florencepanel

faceoff_positive.comments: I was gifted these Floating Under the Eyes Depuffing Gel pads as part of the #florencepanel by Florence By Mills in exchange for my honest review. I love me a good under eye mask / pad and these were no exception! Packaged adorably and the gel pads themselves are cuter than cute which is something I noticed immediately and was tickled with how cute they were. They feel incredibly soothing and cooling when applied to the skin and had a lot of product which did make them slide a little a first. It was an easy fix though as I just scooped off the excess product and rubbed it into my skin and put the pads back in place under my eyes and they worked fine for the rest of the time I wore them. Designed to soothe, hydrate and depuff using caffeine, green tea and cactus extract, these pads definitely helped improve the appearance of my under eyes. It helped smoothed and hydrate the skin, noticeably decreased puffiness and just made me look more awake and renewed! I am excited to try some other products from the range and appreciate that these are also silicone, sulfate and paraben free.
faceoff_positive.headline: Perfect for depuffing those peepers in the morning!

faceoff_negative.comments: I'm very happy I got these as a sample and didn't pay for them. They wouldn't stay in place no matter how many times I put them back. From the moment I placed them under my eyes they started to slide down. Every ten to twenty seconds I had to slide them back up. Blinking made them slide down even faster. After a few minutes of this I finally gave up and just held them in place. In my opinion these are definitely not worth the frustration.
